doc.field: are the paralyzing storms in the east, the drought in the west creating new urgency to take on climate change? i'm going to speak to two people on opposite sides of the issue. bill nye is the science guy and republican congress woman marsha blackburn of tennessee. plus the terror threats in sochi. how is vlad putin cracking down? richard engel has a look at exclusive ways they've cracked down on security. and we're going to look at the cost of the games both
